name: Septiemble
description:
Septiemble is an isometric mini-puzzle game that you have to solve in the shortest possible time to save all your friends because the earthquake has started, like other years, on September 19! Clear the way and give them the bolillo that will save them from fright.

Controls:

You can use both keyboard or a controller to play.

Credits:

Game design, development, art & music by Leonardo Vargas @LeoVargasUx

Free assets used: 

  • Tiny office props and models
  • Particles
  • Base of the character models
  • Street models
